description:
Best location in NYC: steps to Lincoln Square, Theater District, Central Park, Times Square, Columbus Circle and all transportation.  Spectacular views from a high floor in this immaculate doorman building. W/D is down the hall at an additional fee. 
You’ll love my place because of BREATHTAKING VIEWS, THE LOCATION AND THE AMBIANCE. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

There's also playroom  and outside seating area you are available to use on 8th Floor.

Most of the time I'm available on my cell, unless I'm traveling.

Lots of restaurants and shops and very convenient.

West 59th Street is only a few blocks away- 1, C,B,D,A are available here.  Also crosstown buses are on West 57th Street,

Please let me know if you have any allergies or require specific cleaning products PRIOR to booking.
name: Stunning NYC home
review: A perfect location for area attractions with a super view over Manhattan and the Hudson River. The accommodations were modern, clean and comfortable. Fast elevators up/down and nearby coffee shops, restaurants and pharmacies. We felt very comfortable and at home and would definitely return!
